ultrakill.name: Ultrakill
ultrakill.desc: [1H Guns] When under the effects of Rapid Fire you reload 2x as fast. (Play Ultrakill)

rapid reload.name: Rapid Reload
rapid reload.desc: [1H Guns] You have 20% faster reload when reloading an empty pistol.

rapid fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid fire.desc: [1H Guns] When you land a critical shot gain the ability to rapidly fire your critical for 2s. 12s cooldown.

lock n load.name: Lock n Load
lock n load.desc: [1H Guns] The first bullet in your gun does more damage when fully loaded. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 15%. After fully reloading, the last bullet in your gun will do more damage. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 15%.

sleight of hand.name: Sleight of Hand
sleight of hand.desc: [1H Guns] When you flourish an opponent, you instantly load a bullet.
